claimBatchEarnings(address[],address).notice: Claims CRV, CVX and extra rewards from Convex for multiple Curve LP tokens staked.

params._conicPool: Conic pool for which rewards will be claimed.
params._curvePools: List of Curve pools from which LP tokens have been deposited

claimEarnings(address,address).notice: Claims CRV, CVX and extra rewards from Convex on behalf of a Conic pool.

params._conicPool: Conic pool for which rewards will be claimed.
params._curvePool: Curve pool from which LP tokens have been deposited on Convex.

computeClaimableConvex(uint256).details: Not easily computable from the CVX token contract
computeClaimableConvex(uint256).notice: Computes how much CVX can be claimed for an amount of CRV earned

params.crvAmount: Amount of CRV for which CVX will be minted pro rata.

returns._0: CVX amount that would be minted.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposits a Curve LP token on Convex and stakes the Convex Curve LP token in the respective CRV rewards contract on Convex.

params._amount: Amount of Curve LP tokens to deposit
params._curvePool: Curve Pool for which LP tokens should be deposited

getCrvEarned(address,address).notice: Gets total amount of CRV earned by an account from staking an amount of Curve LP tokens via Convex for a single Curve pool.

params._account: Account which staked an amount of Curve LP tokens.
params._curvePool: Curve pool for which earned CRV should be computed.

getCrvEarnedBatch(address,address[]).notice: Gets total amount of CRV earned by an account from staking multiple Curve LP tokens via Convex.

params._account: Account which staked Curve LP tokens.
params._curvePools: List of Curve pools for which earned CRV should be computed.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Curve LP tokens get unstaked from the Convex CRV rewards contract.
withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws Curve LP tokens from Convex.

params._amount: Amount of Curve LP tokens to withdraw.
params._curvePool: Curve pool for which LP tokens should be withdrawn.
